name: Penalties
text:
§431:8-211    (a)  Any person, other than an insured, who in this State represents or aids an unauthorized insurer in violation of this part may be subject to a fine not in excess of $1,000.
	(b)  Any unauthorized insurer who transacts any unauthorized act of an insurance business as set forth in this part may be fined not more than $10,000. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2; am L 1989, c 207, §6]
